response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that is truly invaluable. This product holds immense worth and significance to you, valued at $1,200,000. I am extending to you an exclusive offer to purchase this item at a carefully considered price of $1,100,000. This exceptional offer represents a remarkable chance to secure a piece that not only adds value to your collection but also offers a significant financial advantage over its market value. I trust that you will find this proposal both compelling and advantageous. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you wish to proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 1100000}
